plot: A pair of Laurel and Hardy-like crows pursue Hopalong Casserole, a wily grasshopper whose fatal mistake is to believe a closed iris shot can shield him from his enemies.
title: Hop, Skip and a Chump
plot_es: A pair of Laurel and Hardy-like crows pursue Hopalong Casserole, a wily grasshopper whose fatal mistake is to believe a closed iris shot can shield him from his enemies.
plot_en: A pair of Laurel and Hardy-like crows pursue Hopalong Casserole, a wily grasshopper whose fatal mistake is to believe a closed iris shot can shield him from his enemies.
